description:
It's time to Appgrade! 

Zimbabwe's Leading Mobile Money platform is Introducing an all-new EcoCash app and game-changer for managing your money in Zimbabwe.  This isn't just an upgrade; it's a complete mobile money makeover!

Here's what you can do with the new EcoCash app:
* Effortless Money Management: Send, receive, and track your cash instantly, all within the app.
* Scan & Pay: Skip the lines! Use QR codes for faster and secure payments at shops and vendors nationwide.
* Cash In/Cash Out: Need cash? Withdraw funds easily at EcoCash channel partner locations. Depositing cash is a breeze too!
* Pay Your Bills in a Flash: Utilities, subscriptions, school fees, church offerings – do it all with just a few taps.
* Top Up with Ease: Buy airtime or data bundles for yourself or others, all within the app.
* Shop Securely: Make secure payments at thousands of stores, big and small.
* Stay In Control: View your account balance, transaction history, and even download statements for your records.
* Manage Your Wallet: Update your personal information, reset your PIN, and check transaction fees – it's all there.

We take security seriously. The new EcoCash app features biometric authentication and advanced encryption to keep your financial information safe and sound.

Download the new EcoCash app today and experience the power of mobile money at your fingertips! Live life the EcoCash way!

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

developer: OLD MUTUAL LIFE ASSURANCE COMPANY ZIMBABWE LTD
description:
Welcome to O’mari, we are creating better everyday lives, today and tomorrow. As we walk with you through the circle of life, we want to help you focus on what matters most because we care for you.

We are creating practical solutions for your everyday basic needs that take you a step closer towards freedom. Registration on O’mari is simple and happens in just under 60 seconds.

Manage your everyday needs with O’mari as it allows you to:
•	Access Dual Currencies
	o	Instantly access both a USD & ZWL wallet and choose to transact in the currency of your choice.
•	Send & Receive Money
	o	Securely and simply send to & receive money from family and friends from any wallet or bank account.
•	Buy Airtime & Bundles
	o	Buy airtime and bundles on any network (Econet, NetOne and Telecel) for yourself, and your loved ones to connect with anyone, anywhere.
•	Access O’mari Care
	o	O’mari FoodCare: Have peace of mind by ensuring your family is fed even when you are gone with the several plans that meet your needs.
	o	O’mari SchoolCare: Be happy knowing that your children’s school fees will be paid in the event that you are no longer around to support them. There are several packages to choose from.
	o	O’mari HealthCare: Keep yourself and your loved ones going through access to our rewards program – access HealthCare services from any of our partnered Medical Services Providers. 
•	Painless Bill & Merchant Payments
	o	Buy goods and services at a wide range of retail shops offering ease of payments to municipalities, medical aid, utilities (ZESA, internet services) & more, and providing convenient acceptance by merchants.
•	Manage Your Money
	o	Track and view how you use your money on the go with real-time notifications whenever you use O’mari.
•	Swipe If You Want
	o	Select a card colour of your choice and link the card to your wallet for the flexibility to swipe at any point-of-sale terminal in leading merchants across Zimbabwe.
•	Manage Your ZimSwitch & Visa Card
	o	Request, activate, change your PIN and block & unblock your card in the app if it's lost or stolen.

For Merchant payments using QR codes, grant O’mari access to your phone's camera to enable this payments option.

This is the only official and authorised App for accessing O’mari. Remember to never share your PIN with anyone else.

Need support? Call or email us on toll free line 433 or +263 8677 007 437 and omari@oldmutual.co.zw.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

The Weltrade App is a convenient and secure way to manage your investments wherever you are. Track your portfolio, explore different instruments, and stay in control through an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.

The platform is suitable for both newcomers and experienced users. Clear navigation and helpful features make it easy to get started and keep everything under control without unnecessary complexity.

Weltrade also provides secure processes, transparent conditions, and responsive customer support — so you can focus on your goals with confidence.

Download the Weltrade App today and enjoy a smarter, simpler way to invest.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

Mukuru Money Transfers App for fast, secure, global transfers across Africa, Europe and Asia.

Send Money Instantly with Mukuru which is Trusted by 17+ Million Users. Stay connected with your loved ones across Africa, Europe, and Asia. With Mukuru, you can send money safely, securely, and instantly, anytime, anywhere. Enjoy 24/7 transfers, trusted by millions for fast and reliable global remittance 

---- 
WHY CHOOSE MUKURU? 
---- 

• Send Anytime, Anywhere: Transfer money quickly and conveniently, right from your phone — no queues, no hassle. 
• Transparent Pricing: No hidden fees. Know exactly how much your recipient will collect. 
• Trusted by Millions: Join over 17 million customers who have made more than 100 million transfers with Mukuru. 
• Extensive Pay-In and Pay-Out Network: Access over 360,000 partners across three continents for easy cash collections. 
• Real-Time Updates: Both you and your recipient will receive notifications when the money is ready. 
• World-Class Security: Your transfers are protected with industry-leading technology. 
---- 

UNLOCK MORE POSSIBILITIES WITH THE MUKURU APP: 

---- 

 

• More Ways to Pay: Fund your transfers instantly with bank transfers, debit and credit cards or the Mukuru Card / Wallet (available in select regions). 
• Secure Your Money: Store and manage your funds safely with the Mukuru Card in South Africa and use it to buy airtime and electricity, pay bills, or withdrawals. 
• Higher Sending Limits Made Simple: Upload your documents quickly to increase your sending limits in just minutes. 
• Track Your Transfers: View all your transactions and stay informed with real-time status updates. 
• Exchange Rate Alerts: Never miss an opportunity and get notified of rate changes as they happen. 

---- 
YOUR STORY MATTERS TO US 
---- 

At Mukuru, we know that every transfer tells a story, whether you are supporting a child's education, paying medical bills, or helping with daily essentials. That is why we are committed to making every transfer fast, safe, and successful. 

Download the Mukuru Money Transfers App today and Send, Store and Spend your money with a service you can trust.

Try us, risk-free

CBZ Touch is an integrated mobile app from CBZ Holdings where banking, insurance and wealth management converge and transform financial services into a lifestyle. It gives CBZ clients unprecedented control and security over their transactions by letting them decide how, where and when to transact, e.g. at home, from the farm, at church, at college, at the marketplace, from the Diaspora or on the go. With CBZ Touch, CBZ clients can send money to any mobile number of a Zimbabwean registered network, effect cardless withdrawals, make payments for Insurance premiums, DSTV, City of Harare, Tertiary & School fees, Zimra, pre-paid electricity, insurance premiums and many more. Clients can view the status of their transactional accounts, Insurance & Life policies, Investments as well as submit insurance claims. Powered by ModeFinServer Pvt Ltd
 
CBZ Touch - Zimbabwe‘s first fully integrated financial services mobile app from CBZ - Partners for Success
 
Countries to be listing for the app are - Zimbabwe, SADC countries, England, Canada, us, Australia, UAE, China, Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, Hong Kong, Netherlands, German, Scotland, wales, Ireland, India, Japan, Spain, Italy, France and Belgium.

CBZ Touch - Zimbabwe's first fully integrated financial services mobile app.

The FNB Banking App embraces the future of help and our new look and feel will do just that 
Some features to look out for: 

Simple straight-forward navigation – We’ve added bottom navigation to make it easier to find what you need, when you need it. 
Switch users easily – Multiple profiles?  No problem!  Switch seamlessly between different user profiles by selecting profiles located on the bottom navigation and then select “switch user”. 
Introducing the Action Panel – Bringing your banking features front and center, like payments, transfers, my cards, and cash withdrawals. 
Chat Pay – A revolutionary new feature called Chat Pay that allows you to pay any FNB customer via a simple chat, all within FNB’s secure ecosystem giving you peace of mind that the person you are paying has been verified and approved.  It’s that simple. 

What is Pay? 
We have renamed Payments to Pay.  This feature will provide you with access to categories within payments such as pay, receive, pay bills, payment settings, and payment history. 

What is Secure Messaging? 
Chat to other FNB/RMB customers securely on the App by granting access to your contact list.  Features within Secure Messaging include Chat Pay, voice notes, attachments, share location, etc.

Elirox is an automated trading app that helps you trade smart and simple. Launch trading bots in financial markets right from your phone, without any complicated setups. Get the app and automate your trading today.

EASY TO START

With Elirox, trading becomes easier. Start automating your trades in a few steps:

- Choose an asset (currency, index, share, or another financial instrument).
- Set up trading parameters yourself, or make it even easier with the AI assistant—it selects the settings for your strategy based on your chosen asset and investment amount.
- Start the bot and check the results in detailed analytics.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR TRADING STRATEGY

Elirox is designed for both beginners and experts, and everything is straightforward, regardless of your experience level. You can set up a strategy that best suits your needs:

- Choose from various trading indicators, including RSI, CCI, and MACD, to enhance your trading decisions and market analysis.
- Modify risk management settings to protect your investments effectively.
- Use advanced trading filters to automatically stop the bot when needed.
- Visualize your trading algorithm with convenient real-time charts that track live market quotes.

SEAMLESS BROKER INTEGRATION

Linking your broker to Elirox is quick and easy, whether you use Doto, Exness, or another platform. The intuitive interface guides you through each step, making account setup smooth so you can start trading in minutes.

TRY A DEMO FIRST

If you’d like to practice first, you can start with a demo account. It comes with virtual funds, letting you experiment with the bots and see how they work—without any risk.

- Practice and explore how the app works without any risk.
- Get comfortable with the features before trading with real money.

GET SUPPORT

Our customer support team is here to help with any questions. Use our guides to learn about all the settings and possibilities, or reach out to us via email or live chat.					

Terms of use: https://elirox.com/terms_and_conditions
Privacy Policy: https://elirox.com/privacy_policy

Unlock the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading with Bybit

Join 78 million users to experience seamless, secure and reliable cryptocurrency trading. Trade, manage and grow your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency portfolio today with our simple and innovative platform. No matter if you're a beginner or a professional, or eyeing Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) or other major cryptocurrencies, we're here to make your trading seamless, secure and reliable.

Bitcoin and crypto trading simplified
Our mission is to simplify the purchase of popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), Polkadot (DOT), PEPE. Mantle (MNT), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE) and Hedera (HBAR). Trade Spot and Derivatives pairs easily with fiat or cryptocurrency, including BTCUSDT, ETHUSDT and XRPUSDT contracts.

Our trading features
- Derivatives trading: Trade Perpetuals, Futures and Options seamlessly with advanced risk management tools.
- Spot trading: Enjoy features like Take Profit/Stop Loss (TP/SL) to maximize your trading efficiency. 
- Easy trade: Capture opportunities in the fast-moving Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency market with ease.
- Large trades & positions tracking: Track large Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades with real-time updates. 
- Bybit Card: Spend your Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), USDT and other cryptos at millions of merchants worldwide online and in-store to earn up to 10% cashback in crypto.
- Bybit Pay: Send or spend Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other crypto instantly—with zero gas fees and fast, secure settlement.
- Bybit Alpha: Seamless entry into the world of on-chain trading—bridging Bybit users to DeFi, NFTs and dApps through a fully integrated Web3 ecosystem.
- Bybit asset management: Build your portfolio with tools like Bybit Savings and Liquidity Mining and maximize your gains from Bitcoin (BTC) to newly-listed cryptocurrencies. 
- Copy Trading: Follow expert traders and apply their strategies in your Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency trades. 
- Bybit NFT Marketplace: Buy, sell or trade NFTs with ease in an expanding marketplace.

Why choose Bybit for your Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trades?

Instant crypto trading
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) PEPE and other crytpocurrencies instantly using credit cards, bank transfers or other payment methods.

Optimized experience
Our streamlined UX for Spot and Derivatives trading makes trading Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and other cryptocurrencies easier than ever.

Seamless deposits and transfers
Transfer major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT) and Ripples (XRP) quickly across multiple wallets with full customization options.

Portfolio diversification
Trade Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Solana (SOL), Mantle (MNT), PEPE and other cryptocurrencies on Spot or Derivatives markets, with leveraged tokens, crypto loans and margin trading on offer.

SEND MONEY, FAST

Need to transfer money abroad? Here’s how it works:

1.        Choose your destination
2.        Confirm the transfer service
3.        Select how much you want to send
4.        Add the recipient
5.        Choose your payment method

Download now and get started. Please note:

Your ability to send money with WorldRemit depends on the country you live in. The app will display available services based on your location. Our app supports the same send and receive countries shown on our website.

For more information, please visit: https://www.worldremit.com/

Want to get in touch with us? Whether you have a question to ask or a problem to solve: https://www.worldremit.com/en/contact-us

Instant inter-account transfers

Deriv P2P is a peer-to-peer transfer platform that facilitates fund exchange between our clients. Users can make deposits and withdrawals into and from their Deriv accounts. Users can use 106 payment transfer methods, including Paypal, Alipay, Skrill, Wechat Pay, Webmoney, Google Pay, Apple Pay, P2P wallets, bank transfers, etc for fund transfer. Sell or buy USD in exchange for your local or supported currency (ZAR, USD, GBP, NGN, COP, COU, CDF, LKR, PKR, INR etc.) Find an ad that matches your desired requirements or post an advertisement of your own on our flexible, reliable, and intuitive platform offered on desktop and mobile devices.


Deriv P2P app features:
• Exchange with confidence. 
We verify all app users instantly as an added security measure to help protect your exchanges. You can verify your identity with your official ID.

• Global payment methods
Users can transfer money from their bank accounts using different payment methods. We integrated 106 payment transfer methods, including P2P wallets, bank transfers, Paypal, Alipay, Skrill, Wechat Pay, Webmoney, Google Pay, Apple Pay etc.

• Secure your funds 
Funds are released only when both parties have fulfilled payment arrangements. Find an ad that matches your desired currency and payment method, or post an advertisement of your own.

• Gain better control
Set the currency rate when you sell currency. Have the convenience of pausing your ads when you need to rest from the market.

• Access a broader market
Find a more extensive clientele by running your ads on the Deriv P2P markets. All our users will be able to see your ads and offer to buy from or sell to you.

• Communicate easily
The built-in chat feature lets buyers and sellers connect directly in a secure zone.

• Receive instant alerts
Get informed about orders, exchanges, and chat messages in real-time.
